title: The Blair Script Project
content:
As reported in The Sun - [http://www.thesun.co.uk/article/0,,2-2005560672,00.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090123/http:/www.thesun.co.uk/article/0,,2-2005560672,00.html)

Si

_edited the title to something more sinister_
author: sii

comments.content:
The “trendy” font is Marydale.  
Bet Sir Cliff likes it too.  
“Yesterday’s Men”.

But “W”, being a well oiled machine, would prefer something with more [Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090123/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=pump) :-)

ChrisL

“Reminds me of this one…”

So would someone then prefer the trick or the treat?

ChrisL

Hmmm, don’t hookers refer to their “clients” as tricks?

Chris,

Since you seem so knowledgeable about hookers, do you tip ‘em? ;-)

Lauri,  
I am too old to remember what they are for :-)

ChrisL
